MeanRarity 0.0.1.0000

Reference

Key functions

divpro()

Generate Hill diversity profile

fit_SAD()

Fit a SAD given diversity and a distributional assumption

radplot()

Plot a rank-abundance distribution

rarity()

Compute Hill diversity: the mean species rarity

rarity_plot()

Construct rarity balance plot

sample_finite()

Take an abundance vector and subsample to size

sample_infinite()

Sample a [relative] abundance vector with replacement

subcom()

Subsample of several community vectors A wrapper of sample_finite to take a subset of a bunch of communities, each subset of equal abundance.

Other exported objects

Bt_prob_abu()

Generate "augmented" sample for bootstrapping

Chao_Hill_abu()

Estimate asymptotic Hill diversity

Chat.Ind()

Estimate sample coverage

GUE()

God's unbiased estimator

beeAbunds

Bee specimens from 4 sites sampled with equal effort, summarized

beeObs

Bee specimens from 4 sites sampled with equal effort

combfun()

Sums duplicate values, for determining [species] weights

effort_rare

Rarefied diversity estimates for each site, multiple standards

errs

Estimator accuracy and bias

ipfun()

Inverse function for power transformation

mean_ests

Rarefied diversity estimates for each site

obs_est()

Observed and asymptotic diversity

omit_y()

Convenience function to omit y-axis elements for constructing multi-panel plots

pfun()

Power transformation

plot_data

Sampling variability in Hill diversity

power_trans()

Power scale transformation

try_SAD()

Relative abundances, given richness and distributional assumption

white_y()

Convenience function to blank y-axis elements for constructing multi-panel plots
